categories: Category:Battles of the Krath Holy Crusade during the Great Sith War

nodes.text: Battle of the Chazwa system  (Great Sith War)

A battle of the Great Sith War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and Exar Kun's Sith Empire, was fought in 3996 BBY. At the Chazwa system, the two sides fought with the Sith emerging as the victors.
The battle was referenced in The Essential Atlas. It illustrated the battle on the galactic map rather than in prose.
